scripts.dev: npm run eslint ; npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm -s run browserify:dev > dist/bundle.js && npm -s run styles:dev && parallelshell 'npm run browser-sync' 'npm run watch:js' 'npm run watch:scss' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.prod: npm run eslint ; npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run browser-sync' 'npm run watch:js:prod' 'npm run watch:scss:prod' 'npm run watch:html'
scripts.styles: if [ -f dist/styles.scss ]; then rm dist/styles.css; fi && npm -s run node-sass
scripts.styles:dev: npm -s run styles | npm -s run postcss:dev
scripts.onchange:js: npm run eslint ; npm -s run browserify:dev > dist/bundle.js && npm run reload
scripts.onchange:js:prod: npm run eslint ; npm run build:js && npm run reload
scripts.postcss:prod: npm -s run postcss | postcss -u cssnano -o dist/styles.css
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files && npm run build:js && npm run build:scss
scripts.build:js: if [ -f dist/bundle.js ]; then rm dist/bundle.js; fi && npm -s run browserify:prod | uglifyjs -m > dist/bundle.js
scripts.build:scss: npm -s run styles | npm -s run postcss:prod
